article.name: Learner Support: Multi-factor or Two-factor Authentication Applications
article.title: Learner Support: Multi-factor or Two-factor Authentication Applications
article.body:
Setting up multi-factor authentication (MFA) for your KnowBe4 account requires an authentication application on your smartphone device. The links below will take you directly to where you can download the authentication application.

Important: Before downloading an authentication application to a company-owned smartphone, you should contact your IT administrator to ask which MFA application is recommended for your organization.

After downloading an authentication application, follow the steps in this article to set up MFA in your KnowBe4 account.

Name of Application Android/Google Devices iOS/Apple Devices

Authy

Guide: How to enable 2FA for KnowBe4 accounts

Google Authenticator Download in Google Play Store Download in App Store

Note:There are other legitimate authenticator apps that you can use in addition to the apps listed above.
